metadata.creator: Anonymous
metadata.description:
The database contains ownership information about companies created in 10 offshore jurisdictions including the British Virgin Islands, the Cook Islands and Singapore. It covers nearly 30 years until 2010.

There are legitimate uses for offshore companies and trusts. We do not intend to suggest or imply that any persons, companies or other entities included in the ICIJ Offshore Leaks Database have broken the law or otherwise acted improperly. If you find an error in the database please get in touch with us.

Website licensed under Creative Commons CC-BY-NC 3.0. Please cite The International Consortium of Investigative Journalists when you use information from the database in publications and other works. Credits.
